verses.verse: Now it came<WH1961> to pass when<WH834> Sanballat,<WH5571> and Tobiah,<WH2900> and Geshem<WH1654> the Arabian,<WH6163> and the rest<WH3499> of our enemies,<WH341> heard<WH8085> that I had built<WH1129> the wall,<WH2346> and that there was no<WH3808> breach<WH6556> left<WH3498> therein; (though<WH1571> at<WH5704> that time<WH6256> I had not set<WH5975> up the doors<WH1817> on the gates;<WH8179>)

That Sanballat<WH5571> and Geshem<WH1654> sent<WH7971> to me, saying,<WH559> Come,<WH3212> let us meet<WH3259> together<WH3162> in some one of the villages<WH3715> in the plain<WH1237> of Ono.<WH207> But they thought<WH2803> to do<WH6213> me mischief.<WH7451>

And I sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> to them, saying,<WH559> I am doing<WH6213> a great<WH1419> work,<WH4399> so that I cannot<WH369> come<WH3381> down:<WH3381> why<WH4100> should the work<WH4399> cease,<WH7673> whilst<WH834> I leave<WH7503> it, and come<WH3381> down<WH3381> to you?
Yet they sent<WH7971> to me four<WH702> times<WH6471> after this<WH2088> sort;<WH1697> and I answered<WH7725> them after the same<WH2088> manner.<WH1697>
Then sent<WH7971> Sanballat<WH5571> his servant<WH5288> to me in like<WH2088> manner<WH1697> the fifth<WH2549> time<WH6471> with an open<WH6605> letter<WH107> in his hand;<WH3027>

Wherein was written,<WH3789> It is reported<WH8085> among the heathen,<WH1471> and Gashmu<WH1654> said<WH559> it, that you and the Jews<WH3064> think<WH2803> to rebel:<WH4775> for which<WH3651> cause you build<WH1129> the wall,<WH2346> that you may be their king,<WH4428> according to these<WH428> words.<WH1697>

And you have also<WH1571> appointed<WH5975> prophets<WH5030> to preach<WH7121> of you at Jerusalem,<WH3389> saying,<WH559> There is a king<WH4428> in Judah:<WH3063> and now<WH6258> shall it be reported<WH8085> to the king<WH4428> according to these<WH428> words.<WH1697> Come<WH3212> now<WH6258> therefore, and let us take counsel<WH3289> together.<WH3162>
Then I sent<WH7971> to him, saying,<WH559> There are no<WH3808> such<WH428> things<WH1697> done as you say,<WH559> but you feign<WH908> them out of your own heart.<WH3820>

For they all<WH3605> made us afraid,<WH3372> saying,<WH559> Their hands<WH3027> shall be weakened<WH7503> from the work,<WH4399> that it be not done.<WH6213> Now<WH6258> therefore, O God, strengthen<WH2388> my hands.<WH3027>

Afterward I came<WH935> to the house<WH1004> of Shemaiah<WH8098> the son<WH1121> of Delaiah<WH1806> the son<WH1121> of Mehetabeel,<WH4105> who<WH1931> was shut<WH6113> up; and he said,<WH559> Let us meet<WH3259> together in the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> within<WH8432> the temple,<WH1964> and let us shut<WH5462> the doors<WH1817> of the temple:<WH1964> for they will come<WH935> to slay<WH2026> you; yes, in the night<WH3915> will they come<WH935> to slay<WH2026> you.

And I said,<WH559> Should such<WH3644> a man<WH376> as I flee?<WH1272> and who<WH4310> is there, that, being as I am, would go<WH935> into<WH413> the temple<WH1964> to save<WH2425> his life?<WH2425> I will not go<WH935> in.

And, see,<WH2009> I perceived<WH5234> that God<WH430> had not sent<WH7971> him; but that he pronounced<WH1696> this prophecy<WH5016> against<WH5921> me: for Tobiah<WH2900> and Sanballat<WH5571> had hired<WH7936> him.

Therefore was he hired,<WH7936> that I should be afraid,<WH3372> and do<WH6213> so,<WH3651> and sin,<WH2398> and that they might have matter for an evil<WH7451> report,<WH8034> that they might reproach<WH2778> me.

My God,<WH430> think<WH2142> you on Tobiah<WH2900> and Sanballat<WH5571> according to these<WH428> their works,<WH4639> and on the prophetess<WH5031> Noadiah,<WH5129> and the rest<WH3499> of the prophets,<WH5030> that would have put me in fear.<WH3372>
So the wall<WH2346> was finished<WH7999> in the twenty<WH6242> and fifth<WH2568> day of the month Elul,<WH435> in fifty<WH2572> and two<WH8147> days.<WH3117>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, that when<WH834> all<WH3605> our enemies<WH341> heard<WH8085> thereof, and all<WH3605> the heathen<WH1471> that were about us saw<WH7200> these things, they were much<WH3966> cast<WH5307> down<WH5307> in their own eyes:<WH5869> for they perceived<WH3045> that this<WH2063> work<WH4399> was worked<WH6213> of our God.<WH430>
Moreover<WH1571> in those<WH1992> days<WH3117> the nobles<WH2715> of Judah<WH3063> sent<WH1980> many<WH7235> letters<WH107> to Tobiah,<WH2900> and the letters of Tobiah<WH2900> came<WH935> to them.

For there were many<WH7227> in Judah<WH3063> sworn<WH1167> <WH7621> to him, because<WH3588> he was the son<WH2860> in law<WH2859> of Shechaniah<WH7935> the son<WH1121> of Arah;<WH733> and his son<WH1121> Johanan<WH3076> had taken<WH3947> the daughter<WH1323> of Meshullam<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Berechiah.<WH1296>
Also<WH1571> they reported<WH559> his good<WH2896> deeds before<WH6440> me, and uttered<WH3318> my words<WH1697> to him. And Tobiah<WH2900> sent<WH7971> letters<WH107> to put me in fear.<WH3372>
